mapper.select: SELECT * FROM eco_electric WHERE delete_flag ='0' and enterprise_id = #{value} ORDER BY create_time desc LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into eco_electric ( `equipment_id`, `equipment_name`, `equipment_power`, `equipment_code`, `enterprise_id`, `phase_number`, `number`, `is_or_not_through`, `install_position`, `equipment_use`, `product_id`, `protection_person`, `phone_number`, `equipment_type`, `surveyted_person_name`, `surveyted_person_position`, `full_form_time`, `survey_person_name`, `create_time`, `create_user_name`, `create_by`, `modify_time`, `modify_user_name`, `modify_by`, `delete_flag`, `administrative_division`, `urbanorrural`, `country` ) values ( #{equipmentId}, #{equipmentName}, #{equipmentPower}, #{equipmentCode}, #{enterpriseId}, #{phaseNumber}, #{number}, #{isOrNotThrough}, #{installPosition}, #{equipmentUse}, #{productId}, #{protectionPerson}, #{phoneNumber}, #{equipmentType}, #{surveytedPersonName}, #{surveytedPersonPosition}, #{fullFormTime}, #{surveyPersonName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{createUserName}, #{createBy}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{modifyUserName}, #{modifyBy}, '0', #{administrativeDivision}, #{urbanorrural}, #{country} )
mapper.update: update eco_electric set delete_flag = '1', modify_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where equipment_id = #{value}

update eco_electric set delete_flag = '1', modify_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where equipment_id in
#{equipmentId}
